SVGMaskElementY.summary: The read-only y property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("y")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("marker")}}. It represents the y-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

blockquote.para: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementY.value: An object. The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the y value.
